prompt: Macro photography of a hyper-realistic miniature tiny toddler girl suspended in mid-air, being held between a giant human thumb and index finger, the giant fingers gently pinching her cheek, she is reaching out desperately with one small hand toward a plastic cup of bubble tea with black tapioca pearls and a pink straw sitting on a wooden table below, intense pouting expression, frowning mouth, large watery tear-filled brown eyes, crying micro-expression, adorable round face, porcelain skin texture, dark brown medium-length hair with a green X-shaped hair clip and small gold charm, wearing a textured mint green knitted crewneck sweater, a white pleated mini skirt, mint green socks, and tiny white slip-on shoes, legs dangling and kicking slightly, soft natural daylight illuminating the scene from the left, blurred background of a cozy indoor room with potted green plants and window light, extremely shallow depth of field, bokeh effect, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 style render, photorealistic textures, tilt-shift perspective.
